title: I had a doubt regarding marks for ISAs, will the best 4 ISA marks be taken from best in each subject or best 4 totals?
content: I performed really poorly in one subject in the previous ISA but i did really well in the other one, so i kinda want to relax and want to perform well only in the subject i messed up, would that be fine?

comments.body: Per subject best-of-4 ISAs. You're good, no worries
Same bruh.. Messed up one subject's ISA and did well in rest of the subject's ISA..But afaik we can perform well in the rest 4 and those will be selected for final gpa obtained in that subject
